collections.tree

Class ArrayBinaryTree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • collections.tree.ArrayBinaryTree<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryTreeADT<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayBinarySearchTree, ArrayHeap

    public class ArrayBinaryTree<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BinaryTreeADT<T>

      protected T[] tree

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArrayBinaryTree()
      Creates an empty binary tree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(T targetElement)
      Returns true if the binary tree contains an element that matches the specified element and false otherwise.
      protected void expandCapacity()
      Increases the size of the array
      T find(T targetElement)
      Returns a reference to the specified target element if it is found in this binary tree.
      T getRoot()
      Returns a reference to the root element
      protected void inorder(int node, ArrayUnorderedList<T> templist)
      Performs a recursive inorder traversal.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this binary tree is empty and false otherwise.
      java.util.Iterator<T> iteratorInOrder()
      Performs an inorder traversal on this binary tree by calling an overloaded, recursive inorder method that starts with the root.
      java.util.Iterator<T> iteratorLevelOrder()
      Performs a levelorder traversal on the binary tree, using a queue.
      java.util.Iterator<T> iteratorPostOrder()
      Performs a postorder traversal on this binary tree by calling an overloaded, recursive postorder method that starts with the root.
      java.util.Iterator<T> iteratorPreOrder()
      Performs a preorder traversal on this binary tree by calling an * overloaded, recursive preorder method that starts with the root.
      protected void postorder(int node, ArrayUnorderedList<T> templist)
      Performs a recursive postorder traversal.
      protected void preorder(int node, ArrayUnorderedList<T> templist)
      Performs a recursive preorder traversal.
      int size()
      Returns the number of elements in this binary tree.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the binary tree.

      • find

        public T find(T targetElement)
       throws ElementNotFoundException,
              EmptyCollectionException
        Description copied from interface: BinaryTreeADT
        Returns a reference to the specified target element if it is found in this binary tree. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the specified target element is not found in the binary tree.
        Specified by:
        find in interface BinaryTreeADT<T>
        Parameters:
        targetElement - the element being sought in this tree
        Returns:
        a reference to the specified target
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - if an element not found exception occurs
        EmptyCollectionException - if collection has no elements
